short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension lets you block users on Hacker News.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever wanted to block people on HN? This extension adds a link beside every user's username that lets you hide all their comments. The extension is open source and the code can be found here: https://github.com/finbarr/hnblocker
